lender.name: jaycee
lender.occupational_info:
Holophane, a subsidiary of Acuity Brands, Inc., ranks as one the longest running manufacturers of lighting based products with both indoor and outdoor related applications. They remain unique in themselves being the pioneers in developing the borosilicate glass reflector/refractor design. This technology allows for simultaneous upward and downward directed illumination of light in the environment through the use of multiple faceted prisms in the products design. This in turn leads to the elimination of dark spots and/or glare. This revolutionary vintage style led to its taking up the name of its creator, namely Holophane itself.
Read more about Holophane on these sites:
http://www.acuitybrandsrenovation.com/Home.aspx http://www.idealist.org/if/idealist/en/SiteIndex/AssetViewer/default?asset=UserProfile&asset-id=246573-146 http://www.care2.com/c2c/people/profile.html?pid=596947709#tabs

lender.name: power
lender.occupational_info:
Embertec is an Australian power saving technologies company founded in 2004 by a passionate father and
son team and guided by a number of experienced and respected leaders from the technology, computer
science, energy and management industries.
The company has significant support from major public Green Technology investors as well as a
comprehensive development and production capability that includes in house firmware engineers,
electronics design and strategic partnerships for Design and Production of market-ready product solutions.
The company's main focus is developing intelligent, power saving solutions for the consumer electronics and
appliances industry utilising a unique microprocessor controlled chip and supporting platform technology.
This technology reduces all forms of power wastage, including `standby power' usage - electricity that is
used by appliances while they are turned off, and wastage from devices left on but not being used
decreasing CO2 emissions, impacting the environment and saving money on energy costs.

lender.name: indian art and artists
lender.occupational_info:
You'r Search for Indian Arts and Artists Ends here with Us
Our business Indianartandartists.com is a premier Internet portal and a social media online website & No.1 Artists Search Engine and Internet Directory, dedicated to the promotion of Indian Art and Indian Artists and there talents in India
Indianartandartists.com is the place for you to connect with people, share your work and discover innovative new art & design. This unique art portal is for art makers, insiders, organizations and art lovers. Indianartandartists.com is largest database of Indian art And Artists on web. It now boasts of registered members of just under a million. It is continuously expanding and ever growing community. From painting to sculptors from to choreography every art find a platform here. With us you will have opportunity to put your talent on global platform. * To bring together art lovers with those who create it and to provide an affordable means for artists to promote their work. * To provide a stage for researchers and writers to communicate and interact on specialized subjects. Provide a forum to showcase artworks and creative ideas. info@indianartandartists.com
